transcript:
remarked the count in an inquiring tone. 
"But they say that war has been declared," replied the visitor. 
"They've been saying so a long while," said the count, "and they'll say so again and again, and that will be the end of it. My dear, there's friendship for you," he repeated. "He's join- ing the hussars." 
The visitor, not knowing what to say, shook her head. 
"It's not at all from friendship," declared Nicholas, flaring up and turning away as it from a shameful aspersion. "It is
